recipe.title: Mixed Green Salad with Roquefort Vinaigrette
ingredients: 1/4 cup dried cranberries or dried currants
3 tablespoons raspberry vinegar or red wine vinegar
instructions: Combine baby greens, diced tomatoes, chopped onions, cranberries and pecans in large bowl. Whisk olive oil and vinegar in small bowl until blended. Season dressing to taste with salt and pepper. Mix in Roquefort cheese. Toss salad with dressing and serve.
